mapper.select: select id, file_name,file_type, file_size from submission_process_file where process_id = #{processId} order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into submission_process_file (process_id, file_name, file_path, file_type, file_size, upload_time, create_time, update_time) values (#{processId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{uploadTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
